attributes.action: Tax the pension fund of Sir Fred Goodwin at a rate of 90%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the US House of Representatives passing a bill to levy a tax of 90% on the big bonuses paid to people working at AIG I feel the UK goverment should look to consider an Extradionarie tax on the pension funds of senior executives of bailed out banks.
